00029 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 // Function: NewDesignPage()
00031 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 NewDesignPage::NewDesignPage(LibraryInterface* libInterface,
00033                              QWidget* parentDlg) : libInterface_(libInterface), attributeEditor_(0),
00034                                                    vlnvEditor_(0), directoryEdit_(0)
00035 {
00036     // Create the title and description labels labels.
00037     QLabel* titleLabel = new QLabel(tr("New Design"), this);
00038 
00039     QFont font = titleLabel->font();
00040     font.setPointSize(12);
00041     font.setBold(true);
00042     titleLabel->setFont(font);
00043 
00044     QLabel* descLabel = new QLabel(tr("Creates a hierarchical design"), this);
00045 
00046     // Create the attribute editor.
00047     attributeEditor_ = new KactusAttributeEditor(this);
00048     connect(attributeEditor_, SIGNAL(productHierarchyChanged()), this, SLOT(onProductHierarchyChanged()));
00049 
00050     // Create the VLNV editor.
00051     vlnvEditor_ = new VLNVEditor(VLNV::COMPONENT, libInterface, parentDlg, this, true);
00052     connect(vlnvEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00053     connect(vlnvEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SLOT(updateDirectory()));
00054 
00055     // Create the directory line edit and label.
00056     QLabel *directoryLabel = new QLabel(tr("Directory:"), this);
00057     
00058     QSettings settings;
00059     QString defaultDir = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00060     directoryEdit_ = new QLineEdit(defaultDir, this);
00061     connect(directoryEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(QString const&)), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00062 
00063     QPushButton* pathButton = new QPushButton("Browse...", this);
00064     connect(pathButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(selectDirectory()));
00065     QHBoxLayout *pathLayout = new QHBoxLayout;
00066     pathLayout->addWidget(directoryLabel);
00067     pathLayout->addWidget(directoryEdit_, 1);
00068     pathLayout->addWidget(pathButton);
00069 
00070     // Setup the layout.
00071     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00072     layout->addWidget(titleLabel);
00073     layout->addWidget(descLabel);
00074     layout->addSpacing(12);
00075     layout->addWidget(attributeEditor_);
00076     layout->addWidget(vlnvEditor_);
00077     layout->addSpacing(12);
00078     layout->addLayout(pathLayout);
00079     layout->addStretch(1);
00080 
00081     onProductHierarchyChanged();
00082 }

00091 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 // Function: selectDirectory()
00093 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 void NewDesignPage::selectDirectory()
00095 {
00096     QString dir = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Select Directory"),
00097                                                     directoryEdit_->text());
00098 
00099     if (!dir.isEmpty())
00100     {
00101         directoryEdit_->setText(dir);
00102     }
00103 }

00105 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00106 // Function: prevalidate()
00107 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00108 bool NewDesignPage::prevalidate() const
00109 {
00110     return (vlnvEditor_->isValid() && !directoryEdit_->text().isEmpty());
00111 }
00112 
00113 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00114 // Function: validate()
00115 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00116 bool NewDesignPage::validate()
00117 {
00118     Q_ASSERT(prevalidate());
00119 
00120     VLNV vlnv = vlnvEditor_->getVLNV();
00121 
00122     VLNV designVLNV(VLNV::DESIGN, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
00123         vlnv.getName().remove(".comp") + ".design", vlnv.getVersion());
00124     VLNV desConfVLNV(VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
00125         vlnv.getName().remove(".comp") + ".designcfg", vlnv.getVersion());
00126 
00127     // Check if any of the VLNVs already exists.
00128     if (libInterface_->contains(vlnv))
00129     {
00130         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00131             tr("The component cannot be created because the VLNV %1 already exists in the library.").arg(vlnv.toString()),
00132             QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00133         msgBox.exec();
00134         return false;
00135     }
00136 
00137     if (libInterface_->contains(designVLNV))
00138     {
00139         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00140             tr("The component cannot be created because the VLNV %1 already exists in the library.").arg(designVLNV.toString()),
00141             QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00142         msgBox.exec();
00143         return false;
00144     }
00145 
00146     if (libInterface_->contains(desConfVLNV))
00147     {
00148         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00149             tr("The component cannot be created because the VLNV %1 already exists in the library.").arg(desConfVLNV.toString()),
00150             QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00151         msgBox.exec();
00152         return false;
00153     }    
00154 
00155     return true;
00156 }

00158 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00159 // Function: apply()
00160 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00161 void NewDesignPage::apply()
00162 {
00163     emit createDesign(attributeEditor_->getProductHierarchy(),
00164                       attributeEditor_->getFirmness(),
00165                       vlnvEditor_->getVLNV(), directoryEdit_->text());
00166 }

00168 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00169 // Function: onPageChange()
00170 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00171 bool NewDesignPage::onPageChange()
00172 {
00173     // Discard the VLNV and reset the attributes.
00174     vlnvEditor_->setVLNV(VLNV());
00175     attributeEditor_->setAttributes(KactusAttribute::KTS_GLOBAL, KactusAttribute::KTS_TEMPLATE);
00176     onProductHierarchyChanged();
00177     return true;
00178 }
00179 
00180 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00181 // Function: onProductHierarchyChanged()
00182 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00183 void NewDesignPage::onProductHierarchyChanged()
00184 {
00185     // Update the VLNV's library field if it is either empty or any of the predefined ones.
00186     VLNV vlnv = vlnvEditor_->getVLNV();
00187 
00188     if (vlnv.getLibrary().isEmpty())
00189     {
00190         vlnv.setLibrary(KactusAttribute::valueToString(attributeEditor_->getProductHierarchy()).toLower());
00191     }
00192     else
00193     {
00194         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < KactusAttribute::KTS_PRODHIER_COUNT; ++i)
00195         {
00196             if (vlnv.getLibrary().toLower() ==
00197                 KactusAttribute::valueToString(static_cast<KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy>(i)).toLower())
00198             {
00199                 vlnv.setLibrary(KactusAttribute::valueToString(attributeEditor_->getProductHierarchy()).toLower());
00200                 break;
00201             }
00202         }
00203     }
00204 
00205     vlnvEditor_->setVLNV(vlnv);
00206 }
00207 
00208 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00209 // Function: updateDirectory()
00210 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00211 void NewDesignPage::updateDirectory()
00212 {
00213     QSettings settings;
00214     QString dir = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00215 
00216     VLNV vlnv = vlnvEditor_->getVLNV();
00217 
00218     if (!vlnv.getVendor().isEmpty())
00219     {
00220         dir += "/" + vlnv.getVendor();
00221 
00222         if (!vlnv.getLibrary().isEmpty())
00223         {
00224             dir += "/" + vlnv.getLibrary();
00225 
00226             if (!vlnv.getName().isEmpty())
00227             {
00228                 dir += "/" + vlnv.getName();
00229 
00230                 if (!vlnv.getVersion().isEmpty())
00231                 {
00232                     dir += "/" + vlnv.getVersion();
00233                 }
00234             }
00235         }
00236     }
00237 
00238     directoryEdit_->setText(dir);
00239 }
